text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho, tumhein kya ho gaya ke jab tumse Allah ki raah mein nikalne ke liye kaha gaya to tum zameen se chimat kar reh gaye? Kya tumne aakhirat ke muqable mein duniya ki zindagi ko pasand karliya? Aisa hai to tumhein maloom ho ke dunyavi zindagi ka yeh sab sar-o-samaan aakhirat mein bahut thoda niklega
